channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [NNTL] N2N Technologies Ltd Concludes 40th AGM with No Further Questions
item.description:
N2N Technologies Ltd, a company based in Pune, conducted its 40th Annual General Meeting on December 30, 2025, via Video Conferencing. The meeting was attended by Ms. Trupti Pandit, the Director, and seven other members. The meeting was concluded at 10.25 am, with a total of less than 1000 members as on the Record Date. The members were informed about the E-voting process and the option to cast votes on the CDSL E-voting Platform. Two members asked questions about the ongoing Open Offer and the total number of employees, which were answered appropriately. The meeting concluded with a vote of thanks to the chair.

  • N2N Technologies Ltd conducted its 40th Annual General Meeting on December 30, 2025, via Video Conferencing.
  • The meeting was attended by Ms. Trupti Pandit, the Director, and seven other members.
  • Two members asked questions about the ongoing Open Offer and the total number of employees.
  • The meeting was concluded at 10.25 am with a total of less than 1000 members as on the Record Date.
  • The members were informed about the E-voting process and the option to cast votes on the CDSL E-voting Platform.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: N2N Technologies Limited | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [HDFCAMC] IFC and HDFC AMC Partner to Expand Private Credit Access for Indiaâ€™s Mid-Market Enterprises
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

International Finance Corporation (IFC) has agreed to invest in HDFC AMCâ€™s Structured Credit Fund-l, a Category II AIF, aiming to improve access to finance for underserved mid-market companies in India. The fund, with a target corpus of INR 1,500 crore, has already raised INR 1,290 crore from institutional investors, family offices, and UHNI investors. IFC will contribute up to INR 220 Crore as the anchor investor. The fund will invest in secured credit instruments in a diversified, sector-agnostic manner, excluding real estate. It has already committed INR 380 crore across three deals in various sectors.

  • IFC to invest up to INR 220 Crore in HDFC AMCâ€™s Structured Credit Fund-l
  • The fund aims to improve access to private credit for Indiaâ€™s mid-market corporate sector
  • The fund has already raised INR 1,290 crore from various investors
  • The fund will invest in secured credit instruments in a diversified, sector-agnostic manner
  • The fund has committed INR 380 crore across three deals spanning various sectors

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: HDFC Asset Management Company Ltd | Category: Investment

item.title: [PNGJL] P N Gadgil Jewellers Ltd Opens New Store in Khargar, Navi Mumbai
item.description:
P N Gadgil Jewellers Ltd has announced the opening of a new store at Shree Krishna Paradise, Kharghar, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra - 410210. The store was inaugurated on January 04, 2026, at around 05:30 P.M. This brings the total number of stores to 67.

  • P N Gadgil Jewellers Ltd has expanded its presence with a new store in Navi Mumbai
  • The new store is located at Shree Krishna Paradise, Kharghar
  • The store was inaugurated on January 04, 2026
  • This brings the total number of stores to 67

Company: P N Gadgil Jewellers Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [LOKESHMACH] Lokesh Machines Ltd Receives Order Worth Rs. 22 Crores From Ministry of Defence
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Lokesh Machines Ltd has announced that it has received an order worth Rs. 22,00,46,400/- from the Ministry of Defence, Advanced Weapons and Equipment India Limited. The order is for the supply of 9x19mm Machine Pistol Consisting Sub-Assemblies/Components. The order is to be executed on or before March 19, 2026.

  • Order worth Rs. 22 crores from the Ministry of Defence
  • Supply of 9x19mm Machine Pistol Consisting Sub-Assemblies/Components
  • Order to be executed on or before March 19, 2026

Company: LOKESH MACHINES LTD. | Category: Deals

item.title: [NYKAA] Nykaa Reports Strong Q3 FY2026 Performance with High Twenties Consolidated GMV and NSV Growth
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Nykaa (FSN E-Commerce Ventures Limited along with its subsidiaries) delivered a robust performance in Q3 FY2026 with Consolidated GMV and NSV growth expected to be in late twenties. The Beauty vertical is expected to deliver accelerated NSV growth of late twenties, while the Fashion vertical is expected to continue its revived growth trajectory with NSV growth of mid-twenties. The growth is attributed to the success of House of Nykaa brands, Pink Friday sale, and robust new customer acquisition.

  • Consolidated GMV and NSV growth expected to be in late twenties in Q3 FY2026
  • Nykaaâ€™s Beauty vertical is expected to deliver accelerated NSV growth of late twenties
  • Fashion vertical is expected to continue its revived growth trajectory with NSV growth of mid-twenties
  • Outperformance of House of Nykaa brands and robust new customer acquisition contributed to the superior performance
  • Beauty verticalâ€™s Net Revenue growth is expected to be in the upper end of mid-twenties

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: FSN E-Commerce Ventures Ltd | Category: Quarterly Updates

item.title: [TFCILTD] Tourism Finance Corporation of India Ltd to Co-Sponsor, Act as Anchor Investor in Two AIFs
item.description:
Tourism Finance Corporation of India Limited (TFCI) has decided to act as a co-sponsor and an anchor investor of Holystone Hospitality Fund, an equity focussed Category II Alternative Investment Fund (AIF), investing up to 5% of the fund corpus. The application for registration of Holystone Hospitality Fund as an AIF has been filed with the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI). TFCI has also decided to act as an anchor investor of Certus Real Estate Fund Category II Alternative Investment Fund, investing up to 10% of the total fund size. The application for its registration has also been filed with SEBI.

  • TFCI to co-sponsor and act as an anchor investor in Holystone Hospitality Fund AIF
  • Investment up to 5% of the fund corpus in Holystone Hospitality Fund AIF
  • Application for registration of Holystone Hospitality Fund as an AIF filed with SEBI
  • TFCI to act as an anchor investor in Certus Real Estate Fund Category II AIF
  • Investment up to 10% of the total fund size in Certus Real Estate Fund AIF
  • Application for registration of Certus Real Estate Fund AIF filed with SEBI

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: TOURISM FINANCE CORPORATION OF INDIA LTD. | Category: Investment

item.title: [EQUITASBNK] Equitas Small Finance Bank Ltd. Reports 10.6% QoQ Growth in Gross Advances for Q3 FY26
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Equitas Small Finance Bank Ltd. has reported a 10.6% QoQ growth in gross advances for the quarter ended December 31, 2025. The total deposits stood at Rs. 43,668 crore, showing a 0.97% QoQ decrease. The bank's Cost of Funds (%) was 7.13%. The bank also completed two transactions involving the sale of non-performing assets ('NPAs') to Asset Reconstruction Companies ('ARCs').

  • Gross Advances grew by 10.6% QoQ in Decâ€™25 Quarter
  • Total Deposits stood at Rs. 43,668 crore with a 0.97% QoQ decrease
  • Cost of Funds (%) was 7.13%
  • Bank completed two transactions involving the sale of NPAs to ARCs
  • Equitas Small Finance Bank Ltd. is contributing towards a better society

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Equitas Small Finance Bank Ltd | Category: Quarterly Updates

item.title: [TOYAMSL] Toyam Sports Ltd to Approve Q3 and H1 Results for FY 2025-2026 on Jan 8, 2026
item.description:
Toyam Sports Ltd has informed BSE that their Board of Directors will meet on January 8, 2026, to consider and approve the Standalone and Consolidated Un-Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and half year ended September 30, 2025, along with the Limited Review Report on the Results. The trading window for dealing in securities/shares of the Company will open 48 hours after the declaration of the Financial Results.

  • Toyam Sports Ltd to consider and approve Q3 and H1 results for FY 2025-2026
  • The meeting of the Board of Directors is scheduled on 08/01/2026
  • Trading window to open 48 hours after the declaration of the Financial Results
  • Financial Results are for the Quarter and half year ended September 30, 2025
  • Limited Review Report on the Results to be approved

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Toyam Sports Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [CUPIDALBV] Cupid Breweries to Acquire Rinpoche Spirits and Crochet Industries for Rs. 348.38 Crores and Rs. 5.86 Crores Respectively
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Cupid Breweries and Distilleries Ltd has approved the acquisition of 100% share capital of Rinpoche Spirits Private Limited (RSPL) and up to 8,75,000 equity shares of Crochet Industries Private Limited (CIPL) through preferential issue of equity shares. The transaction is expected to enhance the company's national footprint, capacity, and revenue visibility with EBITDA scalability. The total consideration for the RSPL acquisition is Rs. 348.38 Crores and for the CIPL acquisition is Rs. 5.86 Crores. The board has also approved the execution of a Share Purchase Agreement (SPA) for the proposed transaction.

  • Acquisition of 100% share capital of Rinpoche Spirits Private Limited for Rs. 348.38 Crores
  • Acquisition of up to 8,75,000 equity shares of Crochet Industries Private Limited for Rs. 5.86 Crores
  • Expected to enhance company's national footprint, capacity, and revenue visibility
  • Approval of execution of Share Purchase Agreement (SPA) for the proposed transaction
  • Amendment to the Articles of Association of the Company

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Cupid Breweries And Distilleries Ltd | Category: Acquisitions
